document_data.name: Zymorven Hall
document_data.mainbody:
'''Zymorven Hall''' was a stone keep located in the [[Rauvin Vale]] in [[Luruar]]. It was owned and kept by the [[Zymorven]] family of [[Silverymoon]], who used to to keep an eye on the surrounding lands for decades.

The keep was commanded by [[Harthos Zymorven|Lord Harthos Zymorven]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The keep sat upon a steep bluff, situated between the [[Moonwood]] and [[Evermoors]], that granted a unobstructed view of the [[Rauvin Road]].
document_data.Structure: Constructed from mortared stone, Zymorven Hall featured a high-pitch roof. This roof was decorated with a number of wooden statues carved into the shape of growling wolves. Near the main keep was a small gatehouse that connected to a fortified wall.
document_data.Atmosphere: The interior of the keep was lined with [[oak]]-wood panels and decorated with mounted [[weapon]]s and suits of [[Animated armor|armor]]. Although it wasn't outwardly apparent, many of these armaments were [[magic]]ally animated under the authority of Lord Zymorven.
document_data.Services: The lord of the keep made sure his staff offered hospitality to soldiers who rode along the Rauvin Road.
document_data.Inhabitants: Among the hall's staff were a stableman, a cook, a clerk, a troubadour as well a [[druid]]ic witch who served as an apothecary.
